plot outline: This romantic drama film centers on two lovers who meet during their school days, fall in love with each other. As they get separated due to certain circumstances, they are reunited through the social media network - Facebook, where they reignite their romance and continue their relationship.
title: Sarva Kahi Priye Fakt Tujhyasathi
plot: This romantic drama film centers on two lovers who meet during their school days, fall in love with each other. As they get separated due to certain circumstances, they are reunited through the social media network - Facebook, where they reignite their romance and continue their relationship.
